about: I'm a founder/operator and hands-on builder who ships real systems, not just prototypes. My work sits at the intersection of business VoIP/telecom operations, customer onboarding + billing + provisioning workflows, internal tools and portals, web infrastructure + automation, and compliance-minded operational design.

My primary company is Telocall LLC, where I serve as CEO/Owner, delivering hosted PBX workflows, device deployment patterns, and customer-facing telecom operations. I also build product software, including JBond.app.

I design onboarding and lifecycle automations — plan selection, DID acquisition, billing events, suspension/reactivation logic — to reduce support load and speed up activation. I lead platform and vendor transitions while maintaining continuity for customers and internal operations.

projects.title: Telocall Customer Comms Platform
projects.description: Built and operate a real VoIP offering with customer-facing positioning, features, and onboarding workflows. Designed operational flows around portals, access, and customer support scaling. Managed platform/partner transitions and user experience impact.

projects.title: Portal & Billing Workflow Automation
projects.description: Defined flows for suspension to immediate reactivation after payment (self-serve). Built structured onboarding logic for existing users and new signups: check provider, select product, select plan, DID choices. Architected layered roles and approval workflows (admin/reseller/client).

projects.title: Documentation & Training Platform
projects.description: Built a categorized internal + client education library covering support docs, technical training, end-user docs, and policies. Created repeatable FAQ and runbook content patterns for scalable support.

projects.title: WordPress/Divi Landing Pages
projects.description: Built full landing pages for telecom and related projects using WordPress + Divi. Structured navigation, shelves/categories, and onboarding guidance for users.

projects.title: Windows Deployment Automation
projects.description: Created step-by-step Windows install workflows using an OSDCloud approach. Produced repeatable instructions + branded WinPE launch behavior to reduce manual steps and make deployments consistent.

projects.title: Internal Tracking & Inventory Tooling
projects.description: Designed a workflow to scan internal serial numbers alongside order records (barcode-first). Built modular Node.js structure patterns (server + module + browser JS separation).

projects.title: Billing Platform Setup
projects.description: Stood up InvoicePlane-style billing stack and handled PHP version/extension constraints. Configured vhosts and separated apps (billing app vs WordPress site architecture).

projects.title: CRM Integration & Data Model Design
projects.description: Defined custom objects and fields for a Salesforce integration strategy (structured schema thinking). Designed call-history-style data capture patterns for CRM linkage.

projects.title: Hardware & Endpoint Configuration
projects.description: Dial plan logic for endpoints like ATAs. Vendor provisioning integration experimentation (GDMS-style API direction).

projects.title: JBond.app Product Site
projects.description: Built public marketing pages, roadmap, terms/privacy structure. Product thinking: consent boundaries, relationship tooling UX, and practical support systems.
